mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_USER (USER_ID, USERNAME, REAL_NAME, PWD, ORG_ID, ERROR_TIME, PHONE, MOBILE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, REMARK, LAST_LOGIN_DATE, LAST_LOGIN_IP, LOCKED, DELETED, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE,TOKEN) VALUES (#{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{errorTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locked,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{deleted,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{TOKEN,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_USER SET PWD = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, LAST_UPDATED_DATE = #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

UPDATE SYS_USER SET LOCKED = #{locked,jdbcType=NUMERIC},LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, LAST_UPDATED_DATE = #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

UPDATE SYS_USER SET USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, LAST_UPDATED_DATE = #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: SELECT USERNAME FROM SYS_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

SELECT u.USER_ID, u.REAL_NAME, u.PWD, u.USER_PIC_SUFFIX, u.USER_PIC_DATA, u.AGE, u.BIRTHDAY, u.ABOUT, o.ORG_ID, o.ORG_CODE, o.ORG_NAME, o.INHERITED_NAME, u.LOCKED FROM SYS_USER u, SYS_ORG o WHERE u.ORG_ID = o.ORG_ID AND u.USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND u.DELETED = 0

SELECT u.USER_ID,u.USERNAME,u.REAL_NAME,GET_ORG_NAME(u.ORG_ID) AS ORG_NAME FROM SYS_ROLE_USER r, SYS_USER u WHERE u.USER_ID = r.USER_ID AND r.ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND u.USER_ID > 0 AND u.DELETED = 0

SELECT u.USER_ID,u.USERNAME,u.REAL_NAME,GET_ORG_NAME(u.ORG_ID) AS ORG_NAME FROM SYS_ROLE_USER r, SYS_USER u WHERE u.USER_ID = r.USER_ID AND r.ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND u.USER_ID > 0 AND u.DELETED = 0 AND u.ORG_ID IN (SELECT ORG_ID FROM SYS_ORG WHERE FIND_IN_SET(ORG_ID, GET_ORG_CHILDREN(#{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC})))

SELECT @x:=0, u.USER_ID,u.USERNAME,u.REAL_NAME,GET_ORG_NAME(u.ORG_ID) AS ORG_NAME FROM SYS_USER u WHERE u.USER_ID > 0 AND u.DELETED = 0
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT a.USER_ID FROM SYS_USER a WHERE u.USER_ID = a.USER_ID AND a.USER_ID IN (${excepted}))
AND INSTR(CONCAT(u.USERNAME, u.REAL_NAME), #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) > 0
AND u.ORG_ID IN (SELECT ORG_ID FROM SYS_ORG WHERE FIND_IN_SET(ORG_ID, GET_ORG_CHILDREN(#{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC})))
AND u.ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
ORDER BY u.LAST_UPDATED_DATE DESC

SELECT @x:=0, u.USER_ID,u.TOKEN,u.USERNAME, u.REAL_NAME, u.ORG_ID, o.ORG_NAME, o.INHERITED_NAME, u.LOCKED, u.PHONE, u.MOBILE, u.EMAIL, u.ADDRESS, u.REMARK, u.LAST_LOGIN_DATE, u.LAST_LOGIN_IP, u.CREATED_DATE, u.LAST_UPDATED_DATE,GET_REAL_NAME(u.CREATED_BY) AS CREATED_BY_NAME, GET_REAL_NAME(u.LAST_UPDATED_BY) AS LAST_UPDATED_BY_NAME FROM SYS_USER u, SYS_ORG o WHERE u.ORG_ID = o.ORG_ID AND u.USER_ID > 0 AND u.DELETED = 0
AND INSTR(CONCAT(u.USERNAME, u.REAL_NAME), #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) > 0
AND u.ORG_ID IN (SELECT ORG_ID FROM SYS_ORG WHERE FIND_IN_SET(ORG_ID, GET_ORG_CHILDREN(#{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC})))
AND u.ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
ORDER BY u.LAST_UPDATED_DATE DESC, u.USER_ID DESC
